verses.content: Israel thla mipui po po chu LALPA thupêk angin, an inzin dânbi ang peiin, Sin thlalêra inthawk chu an suok tah a, Rephidimah puon in an zar a; nisienlakhawm, chu hmuna chun mipui ta dingin tui dâwn ding a um nawh a.
Chuleiin, mipui chun Mosie an insêlpui a, “Tui dâwn ding mi pe rawh,” an tih a. Mosie chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga kei in min sêlpui am a na? Iengdinga LALPA chu in fie am a na?” a tih a.

Mipui hlak chu tui duin an dang a châr hleh a, Mosie chunga chun an chier a, “Aiguptaa inthawk keini le kan nauhai le kan ran ruol leh dang- châra mi sukhlum dingin iengdinga i mi ṭhuoi suok am a na?” an tih a.
Mosie chun LALPA a ko a, “Hi mipui hi iengtin am thâwng ka ta? Lunga mi dêng dingin an intûng el a ni sih a,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Mipui hmaa chun fe la, Israel upahai i kuomah ṭhuoi la, chun, vadung i vuokna hmawl kha i kutin chawi bawk la, fe rawh.

Ngai ta, Horeba lungpui chunga sawn i hmaah ngîr ka ta; chun, lung- pui chu vuong i ta, a sûnga inthawkin tui hung suok a tih, mipuiin an dâwn theina dingin,” a tih a. Mosie chun Israel upahai mithmu ngeiah chuong ang tak chun a thaw tah a.
Chun, Israel thlahai helna leiin le “LALPA hi eini lai a um am a ni, a um naw?” tiha, LALPA an infiena lei chun, chu hmun hminga chun Massa le Meriba ân bûk tah a.
Chun, Amalekhai chu an hung a, Rephidimah Israelhai chu an hung do tah a.
Mosie chun Joshua kuomah, “Eini lai pasalhai thlang suok la, fe unla, Amalekhai chu va do ro; zîng- ah Pathien hmawl chu ka kuta chawiin tlâng sîpah ngîr ka tih,” a tih a.
Joshua chun a kuoma Mosiein a hril ang tak chun a thawh a, Amalekhai chu an do tah a; Mosie, Aron le Hur chu tlâng sîpa chun an hang fe tah a.
Mosiein a hmawl ân let sûng po chu Israelhai chun an hneh a, chun, a kut a lâkthlâk phingleh Amalekhai chun an hne ve thung pei a.

Mosie kuthai chu a hung kham chun, lung an lâk a, a hnuoia chun an sieh a, chu chunga chun a ṭhung tah a. Aron le Hur chun sîr khatah pakhat, sîr dangah pakhatin a kuthai chu an dawm tung zing a; chuong- chun, nisa tlâk hmakhat chu a kuthai chu a phar thei ta zing a.
Chun, Joshua chun Amalek le a mihai chu kâwlhnâm ngeiin a sunthlûk dêr tâwl tah a.
Chun, LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Lekhabuah hi hi hriet zing- na dingin ziek la, vân hnuoi po poa inthawkin Amalek hriet zingna hi thaihmang dêr ka tih ti Joshua naa chun inhriettir rawh,” a tih a.
Chun, Mosie chun mâichâm a siem a, a hminga chun “Jehova- Nissi” ân bûk a;
“LALPA chu ka puonzâr a nih” tiin. “LALPA chu ân khâm tah a, LALPA chun a thlahai thla nâwk- sâwng chen khawmin Amalek chunga hin dona nei hlak a tih,” tiin
